label: AgriculturalApplication
comment: Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.

objectProperties.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A specified agricultural application applied to this agricultural zone area.
An agricultural certificate applied to this specified agricultural application.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
A reference to a physical location or place.
A crop plot specified for this agricultural application.

referencedBy.comment: Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.
